org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.savepoint

类 SavepointLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.savepoint.SavepointLoader

  • public class SavepointLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    The SavepointLoader is a utility to load and verify a Savepoint, and to create a checkpoint from it.

    • 方法详细资料

      • loadAndValidateSavepoint

        public static CompletedCheckpoint loadAndValidateSavepoint(JobID jobId,
                                                           java.util.Map<JobVertexID,ExecutionJobVertex> tasks,
                                                           java.lang.String savepointPath,
                                                           java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader,
                                                           boolean allowNonRestoredState)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a savepoint back as a CompletedCheckpoint.

        This method verifies that tasks and parallelism still match the savepoint parameters.

        参数:
        jobId - The JobID of the job to load the savepoint for.
        tasks - Tasks that will possibly be reset
        savepointPath - The path of the savepoint to rollback to
        classLoader - The class loader to resolve serialized classes in legacy savepoint versions.
        allowNonRestoredState - Allow to skip checkpoint state that cannot be mapped to any job vertex in tasks.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If mismatch between program and savepoint state
        java.io.IOException - If savepoint store failure
